alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hardin; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 4:42AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MEADE... SOUTHEASTERN BRECKINRIDGE AND WEST CENTRAL HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM EDT/415 AM CDT/... At 442 AM EDT/342 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Hardinsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Hardinsburg, Radcliff, Vine Grove, Dyer, Constantine, Garfield, Se Ree, Westview and Buras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.
